title: Abraham Was A God-Made Man
itunes:title: Abraham Was A God-Made Man
description:
When you’re willing to follow and believe God, He will make you into the person He created you to be. This is what happened with Abraham in the Bible. His willingness to trust God led to an incredible legacy through which Jesus was eventually brought into the world. When you're willing, there's no limit to where God can take you!Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love. To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
